attributes.action: TO AWARD THE BRITISH ARMY WITH TITLE OF ROYAL
attributes.additional_details: TO AWARD THE BRITISH ARMY THE PREFIX OF THE WORD ROYAL HENCE THE ROYAL BRITISH ARMY THIS WILL BRING IT INTO LINE WITH ALL OTHER SERVICES IE THE ROYAL NAVY,THE ROYAL AIR FORCE ETC. DUE TO THE FACT THAT THE ARMY OVER OUR HISTORY AND ESPECIALLY THE LAST FORTY YEARS THEY HAVE CARRIED THE BRUNT OF THE GOVERNMENTS POLICIES AND CARRIED THE MOST CASUALTIES I BELIEVE THAT THIS ACTION IS A NO ( BRAINER )AND WOULD BE SUPPORTED BY MOST OF THE BRITISH PUBLIC AND ESPECIALLY SERVICEMEN,EX SERVICEMEN AND WAR PENSIONERS I BELIEVE THIS HONOUR IS WELL OVERDUE BUT WELL DESERVED AND TO PUT THE ARMY ON EQUAL FOOTING WITH THE REST OF THE DEFENCE FORCES
